Industries: Artificial Intelligence, Big Data, Employee Benefits, Financial Services, FinTech, Lifestyle, Mobile Apps, Personal Finance, Software

Description: Comprehensive personal financial manager and intelligence platform.
Full Description: Cinch is your personal, always-on, always-loyal CFO.  Our goal is to take care of your financial life and manage it for you – holistically, and all in one place.  All the hard, painful stuff most people hate we will handle for you with only your financial health in mind.   We do this through our intelligence platform that will drive autonomous personal finance – the software that acts as an always-on fiduciary agent across your entire financial life in one single package and across all your financial accounts.   We use innovative technology and behavioral science to optimize financial decisions of any size – from how much to save each month, to the best path out of credit card debt, to making sure you never overpay for car insurance (or any financial product) ever again.   We’re starting with your everyday finances – your debts, savings, day-to-day cash flow, insurance, and large monthly bills – and then turning to your big goals like buying a home, large future expenses, and retirement savings. By starting with the “today” money decisions, the future begins to take care of itself.   And we will be there as your life, and all the financial products out there, change.   Technology has made it so that you can manage your entire life between 5-6 apps on your phone, but personal finance hasn’t caught up. That’s where Cinch comes in – it’s a comprehensive, holistic, and totally unbiased platform that has only your financial health in mind.

Description: Ensu helps people automatically track and manage their emotional health using machine learning and natural language processing.
Full Description: The Ensu platform provides automated emotional health support. Through developing cutting-edge, high signal digital behavioral markers, Ensu's software identifies emotional states and events in life driving those states. Our software then assists users in gaining new perspectives into their cognition through more deeply understanding their thought patterns and identifying flaws and distortions in thinking. We then provide personalized recommendations, interventions and advice to help users manage and improve their emotional states and be their best self. Ensu's scientific efforts are led by Chief Scientific Advisor Dr. Joel Swendsen, the global #1 published scientific researcher regarding the feasibility and validity of mobile technologies in mental health treatment and research. Ensu is also working with other globally leading scientists in niche areas within cognitive psychology, machine learning, and mental health technology.

Description: Gusto provides a cloud-based payroll, benefits, and human resource management solution for businesses.
Full Description: Gusto develops web-based payroll solution for small- and medium-sized businesses. It operates an online platform that provides payroll, benefits, human resources, and integration services for employers and employees in the United States. Gusto offers health benefits and workers’ compensation benefits that include medical insurance, commuter benefits, and 401(k) contributions as well as workers’ compensation insurance plans, time tracking, and integration services, and access to employees for processing payroll from web-enabled devices such as smartphones and tablets. It also provides access to employees and contractors to browse their previous pay stubs, review their payroll forms, verify their personal details, and statistics about their pay, tax payments and federal forms filing services, and security and support services. Description: A comprehensive alternative cash management platform
Full Description: The managing and disbursement of internal funds within the collegiate athletics, business, and nonprofits markets are outdated and prone to bottle-necking; resulting in a lack of transparency and wasted resources. We believe that MunchMoney solves this problem of antiquated managing and disbursement of internal funds for these markets, as our company offers a modern cost-efficient solution that bridges the gap by precisely managing these funds for organizations through fully controllable physical & virtual “smart” debit cards designed for unique programs. MunchMoney cards work like debit cards except they only work within the parameters and balances set by the user (think of MunchMoney as kind of like TV parental controls but for debit cards). Each card is engineered to match the ease and flexibility of cash while also providing insights for greater fiscal efficiencies. Our mission is to revolutionize cash and cash-equivalent spending.

Full Description: Rubica is advanced cybersecurity built for ease-of-use and end-user privacy, extending enterprise-grade protection to mixed use devices, personal environments & remote workers.  Our advanced threat detection and prevention covers all devices (phones, laptops, tablets) on any network or cell connection, no matter what the user is doing online.  Set up is simple: Just download the app.  No hardware, integration or IT support needed.   Our personal and work worlds are now blended.  This requires a new approach to security which gives users convenience & privacy in their personal activities, but assures the company that there’s advanced threat protection covering the device at all times, regardless of whether it’s being used for work or personal.  This is Rubica.

Full Description: SimpleTherapy is a digital healthcare platform that combines physical therapy with artificial intelligence to bring you a musculoskeletal pain recovery program that can be done at home and at a fraction of the cost. They work with individuals as well as employers of all sizes to provide convenient, physician-driven exercises that relieve pain and reduce the cost burdens associated with MSK. Additionally, our corporate wellness program is a cost-effective way to manage employee's muscle and joint pain while keeping them out of the healthcare system, thereby saving businesses thousands of dollars per year per employee. SimpleTherapy is head-to-toe pain recovery accessible 24/7 with no copays and without the need of expensive equipment. They are proud to have over 10,000 users across the world of which 72% report a significant reduction in pain. Too, SimpleTherapy is a valuable partner to decrease healthcare costs and has as clients two of the top 5 national insurance payers and three Fortune 100 employers.

Industries: Artificial Intelligence, Communities, Employee Benefits, Health Care, Machine Learning, mHealth, Natural Language Processing, Personal Health, Wellness
Industry Groups: Administrative Services, Artificial Intelligence, Community and Lifestyle, Data and Analytics, Health Care, Mobile, Science and Engineering, Software
Description: The Support Network delivers AI/NLP-driven precision peer support + hyper-targeted resource recommendations for mental wellness.
Full Description: Therapy isn't for everyone. Connecting with peers going through the same life struggle has been proven as useful, and often more effective, in dozens of clinically-validated research studies. Supportiv is delivering instantaneous peer support as mass-market accessible mental health care for the 80% of adults with typical work stress, family pressures, sadness, anxiety or loneliness, who don’t want or need a therapist. Supportiv is *better* than real-life peer support -- easier to access, more precise, and quicker to help. Suportiv uses AI-driven natural language processing (NLP) to route each user, based on any single thought they express, in real time, to a topic-specific peer support group that dynamically convenes for users with similar issues. Each group has a *super-powered* human moderator who keeps the chat safe and troll-free and is able, again through NLP, to surface precisely relevant resources, recommendations, and referrals right into the group conversation in real-time.
